Welcome to the KDA Website! We created this as a space to help foster a community of Kellogg students who are passionate about data analytics. Our goal is to help guide YOU on your journey to better use data and make analytics more user-friendly.  

We will post content, example code, and any cool examples here. Stay tuned for new content, which we will announce through the newsletter! Use the navigation pane in the upper left of the site to find topics you are interested in.

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us at kda@kellogg.northwestern.edu.
